name: Cycle The Systems
description:
Set on a dead space ship, this quick 10 minute experience is non-linear and can be completed in multiple ways! But tread carefully as something watches you from the dark. Fix and cycle the ships systems to survive.

This is my first game and was produced in 7 days as a little challenge to myself! All feedback is welcome, especially constructive as it will help make the next game even better :)

Main menu and icon artwork by illustra_sean aka TheTallDwarf
